headline: Don’t Miss Out! Class Action Lawsuit Against Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG)
summary: A class action lawsuit was filed against Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) by Levi & Korsinsky on November 11, 2024. The plaintiffs (shareholders) alleged that they bought CMG stock at artificially inflated prices between February 8, 2024 and October 29, 2024 (Class Period) and are now seeking compensation for their financial losses. Investors who bought Chipotle Mexican Grill stock during that period can click here to learn about joining the lawsuit. Chipotle Mexican Grill is a quick-service restaur
